summary.value: In response, I activate my hidden card!

system.description:
ALSO: Deckmancer, Destiny Duelist, High Roller

Aces of Cards make use of special decks to perceive the constant fluctuations in the stream of souls. Each deck is inextricably connected to its user and reflects their taste and personality. By drawing specific combinations at the right moment, an Ace of Cards manipulates magical energy to produce supernatural effects. In some worlds, Aces of Cards duel against each other using their personal decks, in a quest for glory or in order to obtain precious artifacts.

ACE OF CARDS FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points or Mind Points by 5 (your choice).

ACE OF CARDS SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.sfIxI8t0XlJMMVFC]{Double or Nothing}

Before you perform a Check, you may declare double or nothing. If you do, until the end of that Check, any dice you roll that show an even number are treated as if that number was doubled, and other dice you roll are treated as showing a 1.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.tFbGtEfIudpck8vL]{High or Low}} (SL5)

When you resolve a set with Magic Cards, if it includes a joker and/or a 7, you deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn; if it includes a joker and/or a 1, all damage you suffer is reduced by 【SL 】 until the start of your next turn (before Affinities); if it doesn't include any joker, 1, or 7, you recover 【SL × 2】 Hit Points.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.5zF6JTf6nhKbXr69]{Magic Cards} (SL3)

You gain a deck, a hand, and a discard pile.

During a conflict, you may use an action and spend up to 【10 + (SL × 5)】 Mind Points (minimum 10). If you do, discard and resolve 1 card from your hand for every 5 MP spent this way (to a maximum of 5 cards; these cards form a set). After you resolve the effect of the set (if any), draw that many cards.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ry0CUZsygSpySLBZ]{Mulligan} (SL2)

When you hit one or more enemies with an attack during your turn, you may discard up to 【SL + 1】 cards. If you do, draw that many cards.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.dHurcgjvmwVBJPvM]{Trap Card} (SL2)

After an enemy you can see resolves an Attack, Objective, Skill, or Spell action, you may discard up to 【SL + 1】 cards that are jokers or whose suit corresponds to a damage type based on the enemy action: ice (Attack), fire (Objective), earth (Skill), or air (Spell). If you do, draw that many cards; then you may perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 5】 (you must still pay its MP cost) and you cannot use this Skill again until the start of your next turn.

MANAGING THE DECK

  • For deck breakdown and a list of Effects, refer to: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.ooqMmifaiQc2Rcgc]{Deck Rules}
